CustomField.description:
Outside-in rough computation of potential Vemo revenue from school.
Potential = Total Discount X Budget % for ISAs X Expected Recovery Rate X Vemo Share of Collections
Total Discount = Student Enrollment X Tuition X Avg Tuition Discount Rate
Budget for ISAs = 10%
Expected Recovery Rate = 50%
Vemo Share of Collections = 10% (7.5 - 12.5 range)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Outside-in rough computation of potential Vemo revenue from school.
CustomField.label: Potential Annual Vemo Revenue
